Package model

Class SimpleStockModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractStockModel
      • model.SimpleStockModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockModel
    public class SimpleStockModel
extends AbstractStockModel
    The SimpleStockModel object is made for use by a controller to communicate with the useful parts of the rest of the model (methods the user should have access to). This model keeps can keep track of multiple Portfolio, and the current Portfolio in use. It provides methods that are specific to the current portfolios, and other methods that can be accessed by anyone without a portfolios set. Please note: This model does not currently ensure security of these portfolios, beyond requiring knowledge of a portfolios name.
